name: ActivityBook
0:
”Alexa, tell Activity Book I'm bored”
”Alexa, ask Activity Book what is there to do”
”Alexa, open Activity Book.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: activity book
des:
Tell Alexa "Open Activity Book" and Alexa will tell give you something to do.

This skill selects from thousands of activities appropriate for all ages. If the first result doesn't sound good to you, just ask again.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
